channel.title: Entertainment
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Entertainment, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bad Company's Simon Kirke on Death of Bandmate Mick Ralphs Following Hall of Fame Announcement: 'Went Out with a Smile'
item.description: Ralphs, the band's founding lead guitarist, died at 81 in June

item.title: Miranda Lambert's Husband Brendan McLoughlin Celebrates Country Star on Her Birthday: '42 Looks Good on You'
item.description: "The world is a better place because of you," McLoughlin wrote in his Instagram post celebrating his wife’s birthday

item.title: Kim Kardashian Is Furious That Her Family's Psychics Said She'd Pass the Bar Exam: 'Pathological Liars'
item.description: Kardashian took the bar exam for the first time in late July

item.title: Reese Witherspoon’s Polished Look Is the Fall-to-Winter Outfit Blueprint I’m Ready to Wear on Repeat
item.description: I found similar styles to copy her look starting at just $16

item.title: Tennis Player Ons Jabeur Announces She’s Pregnant and Expecting First Baby with Husband Karim Kamoun: ‘Our Tiniest Teammate'
item.description: The Tunisian tennis pro and two-time Wimbledon finalist is married to fitness trainer and fencer Karim Kamoun
